title: Massive Art Fullstack Developer
name: massiveArt
description: Developed and implemented customer solution software using Symfony and React, with a focus on e-commerce platforms. Contributed to the 'Value Force' initiative, promoting collaboration and ensuring the inclusion of diverse company locations.

title: Elements (Valantic) - Full Stack Developer
name: elements
description: Developed and maintained responsive and user‑friendly web applications for clients across various industries. Implemented back‑end solutions using technologies including PHP to handle server‑side logic and database interactions. Successfully implemented and leveraged Pimcore CMS in various client projects within the digital agency.

title: Grand Garage - Frontend Developer
name: grandGarage
description: Planned, designed and developed new front‑end features. Started the website relaunch and set up the project’s architecture as well as the content management system (Storyblok). Supported a new front‑end trainee and mentored her.
